hero.title: FULLSTACK DEVELOPER
hero.description: I create complete digital solutions that combine performance, organization, and product vision.

erp_vivacred.title: Viva Cred ERP
erp_vivacred.description: I developed a complete ERP system for Viva Cred's operational and financial management, featuring JWT authentication, audit logs, and modules such as Production, Clients, Users, Reports, Inventory, and Process Automation.

ead_tecnoponta.title: Tecnoponta E-learning Platform
ead_tecnoponta.description: I built from scratch a complete e-learning platform for Tecnoponta. The system included user authentication, student dashboard, class uploads, learning paths, and certificate generation. Developed using PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.

smart_b3.title: B3 Data Prediction (SmartB3)
smart_b3.description: An academic group project for predicting B3 stock prices. The system applies Machine Learning models (LSTM, GRU, and XGBoost) to forecast short- and long-term prices and displays the data through interactive charts. It also includes sector analysis and prediction ranking.

extrato_fgts_shopee.title: FGTS Digital Statement Automation - Shopee
extrato_fgts_shopee.description: I developed a complete automation tool for generating FGTS statements on the Brazilian government portal, using Selenium with a Tkinter interface. The system reads employee spreadsheets, accesses the official FGTS Digital website, logs in with a digital certificate, and automatically downloads the PDFs. It includes license control, processing statistics, and database integration. This project was built for Shopee's internal use.

analyze_energy_costs.title: Energy Cost Analyzer
analyze_energy_costs.description: An academic project I developed to analyze and compare renewable and non-renewable energy costs. The system generates interactive charts and performs predictive regressions to estimate future costs in X years. Developed as a team during college.

public_vivacred.title: Viva Cred Public Website
public_vivacred.description: Built the public website for Viva Cred using React + TypeScript. Designed a modern, responsive interface showcasing financial services and enabling seamless online requests.

farejador_produtos.title: Farejador de Produtos
farejador_produtos.description: A Data Warehouse platform developed to search and analyze Mercado Livre products. Included user authentication and allowed users to consult detailed product and price data in a secure, optimized environment. Built using PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.

lucascarmona_portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
lucascarmona_portfolio.description: This very website, built from scratch with React + Vite and Tailwind CSS, to showcase my projects, experience, and skills. Features a responsive design, modern animations, and multi-language support (PT/EN).

viva_cred_2024.title: Full-Stack Developer
viva_cred_2024.description:
- Designed and implemented a full ERP system that centralized the company's operational and financial processes, improving control and productivity.
- Automated client prospecting with Python + Selenium, doubling the volume of qualified leads.
- Developed a JWT authentication system and audit logs that strengthened security and internal operations traceability.
- Produced interactive tutorials that reduced new employee onboarding time by 75%.

backsite_2023.title: Information Systems Developer
backsite_2023.description:
- Built a PHP/MySQL (MVC) Data Warehouse that consolidated Mercado Livre seller data and enabled real-time reports, improving analysis efficiency.
- Created an e-learning platform from scratch for Tecnoponta, allowing over 1,000 students to remotely access content and digital certificates.
- Developed a public event scheduling system for São Paulo’s Tourism Department that significantly reduced event publishing time.
- Participated in project strategic planning, ensuring on-time and in-scope deliveries.

viva_cred_2020.title: Full-Stack Developer
viva_cred_2020.description:
- Led the design and development of the company's public website in React + TypeScript, enhancing digital presence and brand credibility.
- Built automations that replaced repetitive manual tasks, freeing up the team for more strategic activities and increasing operational efficiency.
- Identified and implemented an average of four new automated workflows per quarter, driving continuous improvements in internal processes.

aws_cloud.title: AWS Academy Cloud Foundations
aws_cloud.description: Official AWS Academy course covering cloud computing fundamentals with a focus on AWS infrastructure.

laravel_alura.title: Laravel: Build Web Applications in PHP
laravel_alura.description: Comprehensive Laravel training by Alura, covering everything from framework setup to building robust web applications.

python_impressionador.title: Python Impressionador - 176 hours
python_impressionador.description: Complete Python training with 176 hours of practice, including automation, data analysis, and application development.

form.title: Contact Form
form.description: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, questions, or just to connect!

validation.messageMax: Message must be at most 500 characters
